name: angiosperm
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any plant of a group of plants that have flowers and seeds: Angiosperms are the dominant order of flora in the world's ecology. Although yams and potatoes are both angiosperms, that is flowering plants, they are not related botanically. Compare
gymnosperm
spermatophyte
More examplesFewer examplesAngiosperms began to diverge from their fern ancestors towards the end of the Jurassic era.A botanist and academic, he did pioneering work in the taxonomy of angiosperms.Angiosperms grow from seeds enclosed in a case, whereas gymnosperms grow from seeds with no protective case.
